original: @22b * // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @22b * // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: bee da lyam s'u tra n'a ma /
analyzed: bee da lyam s'u tra n'a ma /
translated: Veda-vy캐kara攷ㅡ-s콞tra-n캐ma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba'i mdo //
analyzed: zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba'i mdo //
translated: The S콞tra Called The Subtle Analysis

original: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the master rya N캐g캐rjuna.游댷One who, out of pride in knowing logic,

original: rtog ge shes pa'i nga rgyal gyis// gang zhig rtsod par mngon 'dod pa //
analyzed: rtog ge shes pa'i nga rgyal gyis// gang zhig rtsod par mngon 'dod pa //
translated: clearly wishes to debate,

original: de yi nga rgyal spang pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de yi nga rgyal spang pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to eliminate their pride,

original: zhib mo rnam 'thag bshad par bya //
analyzed: zhib mo rnam 'thag bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain the Subtle Analysis.

original: tshad ma dang gzhal bya ni gnyis ka 'dres pa yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma dang gzhal bya ni gnyis ka 'dres pa yin no //
translated: The valid means of knowledge and the objects of knowledge are both mixed.

original: rang las ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang las ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not established from themselves.

original: yod pa dang med pa dang gnyis ka dag ni ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa dang gnyis ka dag ni ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: Existence, nonexistence, and both are not dependent.

original: ma yin te thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because it would lead to an infinite regress.

original: @23a * // tshad ma rnams ni mar me bzhin //
analyzed: @23a * // tshad ma rnams ni mar me bzhin //
translated: The valid means of knowledge, like a lamp,

original: rang dang gzhan sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: establish both themselves and others.

original: tshad ma rnams la ni tshad ma med de mar me ni 'phrad pa'am ma 'phrad pa'i mun pa gsal bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma rnams la ni tshad ma med de mar me ni 'phrad pa'am ma 'phrad pa'i mun pa gsal bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no valid cognition in regard to valid cognitions, just as a lamp does not illuminate either by contacting or not contacting darkness.

original: gza'i gnod pa bzhin du 'dir yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gza'i gnod pa bzhin du 'dir yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: And here, as in the case of the harm of the planets, the same applies.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.游댷

original: dpe dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the contradiction with the example.

original: bstan bcos las 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa po de yang seng ge la sogs pa dang mtshungs par mngon par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos las 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa po de yang seng ge la sogs pa dang mtshungs par mngon par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: And in the treatise, the one who acts in the world is accepted as being similar to a lion, etc.

original: mar me ni rang gi bdag nyid gsal ba ma yin te //
analyzed: mar me ni rang gi bdag nyid gsal ba ma yin te //
translated: A lamp does not illuminate itself,

original: mun pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mun pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no darkness.

original: phyin ci log tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir mun pa yang bdag nyid la sgrib par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir mun pa yang bdag nyid la sgrib par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: And darkness would obscure itself, because of the absurd consequence of error.

original: tshad ma dang gzhal bya dag ni dus gsum du ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: tshad ma dang gzhal bya dag ni dus gsum du ma grub pa'o //
translated: Valid cognitions and objects of valid cognition are not established in the three times.

original: dus gsum du ma grub pas tshad ma dang gzhal bya 'gag pa mi 'thad do //
analyzed: dus gsum du ma grub pas tshad ma dang gzhal bya 'gag pa mi 'thad do //
translated: Since they are not established in the three times, the cessation of valid cognitions and objects of valid cognition is not tenable.

original: dgag pa grub na tshad ma dang gzhal bya 'ang grub bo zhe na /
analyzed: dgag pa grub na tshad ma dang gzhal bya 'ang grub bo zhe na /
translated: If cessation is established, then valid cognitions and objects of valid cognition are also established.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No,游댷because of the contradiction with the example.

original: sngar khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the previous admission.

original: gal te tshad ma dang gzhal bya ma grub par khas blangs pa yin na ni khas blangs pa dang dus mnyam kho nar rtsod pa rdzogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te tshad ma dang gzhal bya ma grub par khas blangs pa yin na ni khas blangs pa dang dus mnyam kho nar rtsod pa rdzogs pa yin no //
translated: If you admit that the valid cognition and the object of valid cognition are not established, then the debate is finished right there.

original: ma grub pa la rtog pa spang pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa la rtog pa spang pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the conception of the nonestablished is to be abandoned.

original: mngon sum la sogs pa ni yod pa ma yin to //
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs pa ni yod pa ma yin to //
translated: Direct perception and so on do not exist.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the realization of reality.

original: mngon sum la sogs pa grub na gzhal bya ni 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs pa grub na gzhal bya ni 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: If direct perception and so on are established, then the object of valid cognition is not tenable.

original: de'i rkyen can yin pa'i phyir shes pa ma yin zhing shes bya ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i rkyen can yin pa'i phyir shes pa ma yin zhing shes bya ma yin no //
translated: Because it is conditioned by that, it is not knowledge and it is not an object of knowledge.

original: blo ni tshad ma ma yin te //
analyzed: blo ni tshad ma ma yin te //
translated: The mind is not a valid cognition,

original: gzhal bya yin par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhal bya yin par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is said to be an object of valid cognition.

original: dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa la the tshom med do /
analyzed: dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa la the tshom med do /
translated: There is no doubt about the observed object and the nonobserved object.

original: yod pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the existent is nonexistent.

original: the tshom za ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: the tshom za ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Doubt does not exist,

original: khyad par la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not depend on a particular object.

original: khyad par la ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par la ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not dependent on a distinction.

original: sngar bkag zin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sngar bkag zin pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it has already been refuted.

original: dgos pa med de /
analyzed: dgos pa med de /
translated: There is no purpose.

original: yod pa dang med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of existence and non-existence.

original: bye ma la 'jug pa ma yin te //
analyzed: bye ma la 'jug pa ma yin te //
translated: It is not like sand.

original: dpe yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is an example.

original: de yang snga ma dang mtshungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang snga ma dang mtshungs pa nyid do //
translated: That is the same as before.

original: mtha' mthong ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mtha' mthong ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not like seeing the end.

original: thog ma dang dbus med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang dbus med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no beginning or middle.

original: me ni gzi brjid kyi dpe ma yin te //
analyzed: me ni gzi brjid kyi dpe ma yin te //
translated: Fire is not an example of brilliance.

original: chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the similarity of attributes.

original: gzi brjid kyi dpe chu yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzi brjid kyi dpe chu yang ma yin te /
translated: Water is not an example of brilliance.

original: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the dissimilarity of attributes.

original: gzhan yang cung zad chos mthun pas @23b yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang cung zad chos mthun pas @23b yin no zhe na /
translated: Moreover, if it is said to be so because of a slight similarity of attributes,

original: ma yin te //
analyzed: ma yin te //
translated: it is not so.

original: ri rab dang skra bzhin no //
analyzed: ri rab dang skra bzhin no //
translated: Like Mount Meru and hair.

original: phal cher chos mthun pas ma yin te /
analyzed: phal cher chos mthun pas ma yin te /
translated: It is not so because of a majority of similar attributes.

original: sngar bkag pa'i phyir ro //游댷thog ma ma grub na tha ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sngar bkag pa'i phyir ro // thog ma ma grub na tha ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it has been refuted before.游댷If the beginning is not established, the end is not established.

original: gal te thog ma ma grub na dbus dang mtha' ma gnyis ma grub bo //
analyzed: gal te thog ma ma grub na dbus dang mtha' ma gnyis ma grub bo //
translated: If the beginning is not established, the middle and end are not established.

original: yan lag can med pa'i phyir yan lag yod pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: yan lag can med pa'i phyir yan lag yod pa ma yin no ;
translated: Since there is no whole, there are no parts.

original: / tshogs pa la yang ma grub ste //
analyzed: / tshogs pa la yang ma grub ste //
translated: Nor is it established in the collection,

original: re re la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: re re la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not exist in each.

original: yan lag can yang du mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yan lag can yang du mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The whole would be multiple.

original: yan lag can gcig yin pa'i phyir yan lag thams cad gcig tu thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yan lag can gcig yin pa'i phyir yan lag thams cad gcig tu thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the whole is one, it follows that all parts are one.

original: dus gsum du ma grub pas yan lag can med do //
analyzed: dus gsum du ma grub pas yan lag can med do //
translated: Since it is not established in the three times, the whole does not exist.

original: 'on te rtsa bal ba dza bzhin du 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te rtsa bal ba dza bzhin du 'grub pa yin no //
translated: But it is established like the root of a b캐攷셔 tree.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not,

original: bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pas so //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pas so //
translated: because it is the same as what is to be proven.

original: rigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not logical.

original: gzhan yang yan lag can la yan lag dgos pa ltar //
analyzed: gzhan yang yan lag can la yan lag dgos pa ltar //
translated: Moreover, just as the whole is necessary for the parts,

original: yan lag thams cad la yang yan lag yod par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad la yang yan lag yod par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it follows that all parts would also have parts.

original: dam bca' ba las gtan tshigs gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bca' ba las gtan tshigs gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reason is neither different from nor nondifferent from the thesis.

original: gtan tshigs ma yin na //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma yin na //
translated: If it is not a reason,

original: gtan tshigs la gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no reason for a reason.

original: dam bca' dang gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir nye bar sbyar ba dang mjug bsdu ba dag med pa yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' dang gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir nye bar sbyar ba dang mjug bsdu ba dag med pa yin no //
translated: because there is no thesis and no reason, there is no application and no conclusion.

original: lhag ma dag la yang gtan tshigs med do //
analyzed: lhag ma dag la yang gtan tshigs med do //
translated: There is no reason for the other [parts].

original: gal te grub pa gtan tshigs byas pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te grub pa gtan tshigs byas pa yin no //
translated: If the established is the reason,

original: ci zhig thob ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig thob ce na /
translated: what is obtained?

original: dpe la sogs pa don med do //
analyzed: dpe la sogs pa don med do //
translated: The example, etc. are meaningless.

original: gtan tshig don med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gtan tshig don med pa nyid do //
translated: The reason is meaningless.

original: bdag med de //
analyzed: bdag med de //
translated: There is no self,

original: ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not established.

original: gzhan dang gzhan brjod pa'i phyir gcig la gcig med do //
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan brjod pa'i phyir gcig la gcig med do //
translated: Because of the expression of other and other, there is no one in the other.

original: yi ge dag la'ang de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: yi ge dag la'ang de lta bu yin no //
translated: It is the same with the letters.

original: the tshom bzhin du rtog ge yang yin no ;
analyzed: the tshom bzhin du rtog ge yang yin no ;
translated: Like doubt, there is also reasoning.

original: / rdzas yod pa dang / gcig nyid la sogs pa dag ni /
analyzed: / rdzas yod pa dang / gcig nyid la sogs pa dag ni /
translated: As for substantial existence, oneness, etc.,

original: gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa gnyis ka mi 'thad pa'i phyir gtan la dbab pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa gnyis ka mi 'thad pa'i phyir gtan la dbab pa med do //
translated: because neither difference nor non-difference is tenable, there is no conclusion.

original: rtsod pa ni yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: rtsod pa ni yod pa ma yin te //
translated: There is no dispute,

original: brjod pa dang brjod par bya'i dag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod pa dang brjod par bya'i dag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no expression and no object of expression.

original: don dam pa dpyod pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don dam pa dpyod pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because this is the context of ultimate analysis,

original: brda byas pa'i ming dag ni rnam pa du mar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brda byas pa'i ming dag ni rnam pa du mar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the names that are agreed upon are seen to be of many forms.

original: 'jig rten pa'i mkhas pa dag kyang rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba du mar sbyor bar mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i mkhas pa dag kyang rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba du mar sbyor bar mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: And because worldly experts are seen to apply the expressed and the expresser in many ways.

original: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba gcig nyid dang / gzhan nyid du ma grub bo //游댷brjod pa dang sun ci phyin du rgol ba dag kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba gcig nyid dang / gzhan nyid du ma grub bo // brjod pa dang sun ci phyin du rgol ba dag kyang de bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, the expresser and the expressed are not established as being the same or different.

original: gtan tshigs @24a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs @24a * //
translated: The same goes for the expressed and the refuter, and the expresser and the refuter.

original: ltar snang ba ni med do //
analyzed: ltar snang ba ni med do //
translated: There are no fallacious reasons.

original: chos mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no similarity or dissimilarity.

original: ma 'khrul ba ni 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma 'khrul ba ni 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no non-mistaken because there is no non-error.

original: 'khrul pa dang bcas pa'i gtan tshigs yod do zhe na //
analyzed: 'khrul pa dang bcas pa'i gtan tshigs yod do zhe na //
translated: There is a reason that is erroneous, you say?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.游댷

original: de dag ni gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because those are different.

original: skad cig ma nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of momentariness.

original: khyed kyi gtan tshigs thams cad 'gal ba brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: khyed kyi gtan tshigs thams cad 'gal ba brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: All your reasons are stated as contradictory,

original: 'khrul pa dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: and they are erroneous.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.游댷

original: snga ma dang phyi mar 'byung bas 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi mar 'byung bas 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no contradiction in the earlier and later arising.

original: 'das pa 'das par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: 'das pa 'das par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If the past were to become past,

original: 'das pa ni 'das par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'das pa ni 'das par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: the past would become future.

original: rjod byed kyi rnam pa thams cad med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i yang phyir ro //游댷'das pa'i gtan tshigs sam dus ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rjod byed kyi rnam pa thams cad med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i yang phyir ro // 'das pa'i gtan tshigs sam dus ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: And because it would follow that all the aspects of the verbal expressions would not exist.

original: mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The past is not a reason or time because it is impossible.

original: khyod kyi thams cad tshig don du brjod pa yin gyi /游댷don dam pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: khyod kyi thams cad tshig don du brjod pa yin gyi / don dam pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: You say: All is expressed by words, but not ultimately.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.游댷

original: lan thams cad la thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lan thams cad la thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it follows that all answers are the same.

original: skyes pa dang ma skyes pa dang / gnyis ka med pa'i phyir ltag chod ni med de //
analyzed: skyes pa dang ma skyes pa dang / gnyis ka med pa'i phyir ltag chod ni med de //
translated: There is no reductio because there is no arising, nonarising, or both.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.游댷

original: snga ma dang phyi ma gcig dang gzhan nyid la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma gcig dang gzhan nyid la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no such thing as the earlier and later being the same or different.

original: tshar gcad pa'i gnas kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: tshar gcad pa'i gnas kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The same goes for the grounds for refutation.

original: tshar gcad pa'i gnas la ni /
analyzed: tshar gcad pa'i gnas la ni /
translated: As for the grounds for refutation,

original: tshar gcad pa med pa de bcings pa bzhin no //
analyzed: tshar gcad pa med pa de bcings pa bzhin no //
translated: The absence of refutation is like a bondage.

original: gnyis ka khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because neither is accepted.

original: de ma grub na ma grub du zad do //
analyzed: de ma grub na ma grub du zad do //
translated: If it is not established, it is simply not established.

original: de kho na bzhin du brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not said in exactly that way.

original: mngon par brjod pa ni med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa ni med pa nyid yin no //
translated: The expression is non-existent.

original: zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba'i mdo /
analyzed: zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba'i mdo /
translated: The Sutra Named the Finely Woven

original: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The composition of the master rya N캐g캐rjuna is complete.

original: // / kha che'i pandi ta aa na nta dang / lo tstsha ba dge slong grags 'byor shes rab kyis bsgyur pa'o//
analyzed: // / kha che'i pandi ta aa na nta dang / lo tstsha ba dge slong grags 'byor shes rab kyis bsgyur pa'o//
translated: Translated by the Kashmiri pa攷拷껼ta Ananta and the Tibetan translator-monk Drak-칬 Sherab.
